SOLAR POWERED & 8 MODESï¼šPut the Christmas Lollipop stake lights outdoor and keep the switch “ON”, it will automatically charge during the day and light up at night. It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash and steady on. Note: the solar power is light control, the pathway lights will not light up with the daylight.
WATERPROOF & EASY TO INSTALLï¼šFcysy Lollipop Led Christmas Lights outdoor are IP44 waterproof which means it can stand with any weather condition. Easy to install, you can stake the Xmas lights to anywhere you want to decorate.
PERFECT CHRISTMAS DÃ‰COR OUTDOOR: Brighten your Garden with our classic solar lollipop lights. Solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof can be used in pathway, walkway, and driveway, front yards, garden and lawn decoration. Share the warm Christmas atmosphere with your neighbors.
IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT: This cute and warm light up lollipop yard light is perfect gift for friends and family. It is a useful Christmas and holiday Day gift to decorate festival, can be placed anywhere outside your home to create perfect holiday atmosphere.

Extra Large Size: 24 inches tall, amazing size, conspicuous and impressive.
Package Included: 5 Pcs Christmas yard signs – Ginch, Whoville Pole, Cindy Lou Who, Max, Gift Box, Ginch and Whoville Pole are respectively composed of two pieces. Lovely and unique design is really suitable for Christmas decorations outdoor.
Shining at Night: This Christmas yard sign comes with two 13ft long LED colorful light strings, can twining round the yard signs to emit brilliant lights at night. The battery box is not waterproof and needs to be shielded when used outdoors on rainy days, giving you a beautiful night.The string lights use 3 AA batteries, can last 60-100H.
High-Quality Material: This Grinch yard signs are made of thickened corrugated cardboard, which is waterproof and environmentally friendly.
Easy to Assemble: This Christmas lawn decorations kit contains 4Pcs 6â€™â€™ plastic stakes, 6Pcs 12â€™â€™ plastic stakes, 2Pcs H-shaped support. You only need to use short stake to assemble Ginch sign and Whoville Pole together, and then use H-shaped support to fix Ginch and Whoville Pole on the lawn. Cindy Lou Who, Max and Gift Box respectively use two 12 inch plastic stakes to insert on the lawn. It’s very easy to assemble the outdoor decoration for Christmas!
Various Applications: The Xmas yard sign go extremely well with the Christmas lawn and yard decorations. You may place them in your lawn to make your Christmas merry and leave your guests and family with fascinating and enduring holiday memories.
Customer Service: If you have any ideas or suggestions about our products and services, please contact us and rest assured that we will satisfy you.

Dimmable and energy saving: G40 outside porch string light come with 25*2 clear edison g40 bulbs and 2 spare replacement bulb. 1.56 inch light bulbs have e12 or c7 candelabra socket base, 5W per bulb, help you to save more electricity bill. Cute bulbs are dimmer compatible, creating a warm and romantic atmosphere that will make you feel relaxed and happy
Connectable and portable outdoor lights: 25*2 hanging sockets, 6 inch lead with male plug, 12 inch spacing between bulbs, 6 inch tail with female connector, total length 25 feet. End to end connect up to 3 strands. Portable size for easy carrying and storage
Safety and durable: UL certified deck lights is built with weatherproof technology, which can withstand extreme temperatures, rain, wind, and damp climates. Safe and durable electric bistro lights either with a built-in spare fuse for easy replacement
Practical and easy to install: This outdoor decorative light string is very easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere as you need. flexible and practical, a light bulb that goes out does not affect other lighting bulbs, for its vintage style light string, please search B07W59GM6J
Widely used: Our commercial lights are the perfect decoration for balcony terrace, garden, Bistro, pergola, gazebo, tent, barbecue, city roof, market, cafe, umbrella, dinner, wedding, birthday, party etc. For Bulbs replacement, please search B00R25V92Y

About Us:

Tevxj creates premium party products that love life and have fun.

Our mission: Vivid design, fun elements, to provide customers with chic party kits to make your party more exciting and impressive!

Package Include:You will get 8pcs glow in the dark large cartoons Xmas yard signs,16 plastic stakes and 4 pieces of 2m string light.Large size and large quantity will give you a extra-value meal.
Premium Quality:Made of plastic cardboard, light and durable, waterproof and weatherproof. High quality printing technology will not fade easily.These Christmas yard sign with light are very suitalbe for outdoor, and can be reused for many years.
Easy to use:These Christmas yard decorations has Simple Assembly Required.The package will give you 8 pieces of large sign and 16 plastic poles. You only need to insert two poles into the North Pole sign and press them into the ground. The package also comes with 4 pieces of 2m string light and 40 stickers. You can stick these string lights on signs to make them glow in the dark.
Unique Design:Unlike other products, the design of these Christmas yard signs are more interesting and vivid. Sticking them in the ground will create the effect of coming out of the ground.It will be a unique decoration for Christmas.
Christmas Decorations:These Christmas yard signs are specific and rich in Christmas elements. Decorating them in your yard will attract the attention of neighbors and passers-by and make your Christmas memorable.

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentineâ€™s Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

â€”Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

â€”8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

â€” 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

â€”Timer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

â€”Memory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

â€”Safe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

â€”IP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual
ã€Warm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Controlã€‘Including (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. ã€IP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORSã€‘Perfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
ã€4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Functionã€‘Our Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
ã€Safety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shapeã€‘UL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
ã€What You Get & Quality Assuranceã€‘1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

Super long 1000 LED Christmas String Lights

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Output: 29V Low Voltage

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

We wish you can have a colorful holidays

8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control

Christmas string lights come with 8 modes, including combination, in waves,slo-glo,chasing/fade, slow fade,twinkling/flash,sequential, in wave modes.From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

Safe to Touch & IP44 Waterproof

Stay cool, you can use and touch them outdoors or indoors safely. Come with a 29V low voltage power plug. More safe and Less power consumption.IP44 waterproof and designed to withstand bad weather.

Timer & Memory Function

Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. Built in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset everyday.

4 Brightness Levels

Press DIM+/Dim- via remote controller to adjust brightness level (100%-75%-50%-25%) to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $169.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:17 UTC – Details)

Product Description

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Fantastic Christmas Decorations

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. This deer family includes 240 warm white LED lights with a random twinkling effect for added brightness and sparkle for your lawn.

Durable powder-coated metal frame, Easy to assemble

Pre-Lit Christmas Deer Family create a dramatic presence with their glittering material and elegantly styled removable red bows around their necks. With the long life of LED bulbs, this deer family will continue to shine bright throughout many holiday seasons. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

Durable powder-coated metal frame

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

Sparking in the sun

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

Red Bow Decoration

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.

Great Christmas Decorations: Made of metal wire, the Christmas deer decorations are durable, corrosion-resistant and can withstand harsh wind and weather conditions. This set of 3 reindeer decoration outdoor yard includes a buck, a doe and a fawn in different poses, with 3D modelling and vivid poses to make the reindeer Christmas decoration look even more charming and cute, it is the perfect Christmas outdoor decorations to welcome your family.
Easy to Assemble: The deer Christmas decorations are easy to assemble without tools, as all the parts snap into place with ease. The stunning deer Christmas decorations can be completed in minutes. Each deer has an individual plug to display them individually or together.
Lighted Design: The outdoor Christmas reindeer has built-in 240 LED lights to create the perfect night display. Just simply plug in and unplug to turn the lights on and off. The lights make the outdoor Christmas reindeer extremely attractive and bring an eye-catching view to your lawn and yard.
Elegant Details: Celebrate the season with a heartwarming snapshot of a deer family, intricately designed with festive details like shining red bows and a shimmery fabric; BUCK DIMENSIONS: 24″(L) x 51″(W) x 60″(H); DOE DIMENSIONS: 22″(L) x 12″(W) x 47″(H); FAWN DIMENSIONS: 18.5″(L) x 6.3″(W) x 27.5″(H)
Perfect for Outdoor Christmas Decorations: The reindeer outdoor decorations are perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations. Reindeer outdoor decorations can decorate any place, such as lawns, front porches, patios, gardens. It also makes a great Christmas gift for friends and family.

3-Piece Lighted Reindeer Christmas Decoration Family Set

Fantastic Christmas Decorations

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with Pre-Lit 3-Piece Lighted Deer Family. These deer will stand proud in your yard to welcome guests, and share your holiday spirit with the neighborhood. This deer family includes 240 warm white LED lights with a random twinkling effect for added brightness and sparkle for your lawn.

Pre-Lit Christmas Deer Family create a dramatic presence with their glittering material and elegantly styled removable red bows around their necks. With the long life of LED bulbs, this deer family will continue to shine bright throughout many holiday seasons. These LED bulbs have a long bulb life, 25,000 hours on average, Recommended for both indoor and outdoor use.

Durable powder-coated metal frame

The light up Christmas deer is made of a durable metal frame and covered in hand-sewn tinsel fabrics, features LED flashing lights for a amazing look.

Sparking in the sun

The Charming lighting will attract eyes and may make your yard full of festive atmosphere.

Red Bow Decoration

With the embellishment of bows, the Christmas lighted deer look even more vivid.

Read more

Price: $169.99 - $149.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:17 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Welcome to whovilve: The red and green design with the words “Welcome to whovilve”, Christmas tree, hat and other elements are integrated. It’s a great way to brighten up the day of anyone passing by your home.

Easy to use: The sign is folded, just unfold it and fix the stake on the ground. Convenient and quick.
